```{r}
library(survival)

SBCountyJail <- read.csv("~/Github/STA222FinalProj/RMD Files/SBCountyJail.csv")

# Removing unncessessary rows and columns 
SBCountyJail <- SBCountyJail[-c(seq(100, 109)),]
SBCountyJail <- SBCountyJail[,-c(4, 5, 6, 10)]
SBCountyJail
```

```{r}
# More data cleaning, turning the date columns from strings to datetime objects 
library(lubridate)
SBCountyJail$Date.of.Intake <- mdy(SBCountyJail$Date.of.Intake)

# More data cleaning, turning the date columns from strings to datetime objects 
SBCountyJail$Date.of.Intake <- as.Date(SBCountyJail$Date.of.Intake, format = "%m/%d/$Y")
SBCountyJail$Date.of.Intake

```
